website_summaries.verdict: If you need a simple, small, portable, fire-resistant box to secure valuables, medications, paperwork, cell phone, or media such as DVDs, CDs, and USBs, this little safe fits the bill.
pros: Double steel wall construction makes it sturdier than you'd think given the size
cons: Corners can be pried open with enough force
Not quite big enough to hold letter-size documents without folding

customer_reviews.title: Fire resistant
customer_reviews.text: My house caught on fire a few days ago (Mccully Fire, Hawaii) and I lost all my possessions. However , all the items that were in the survive. Thank you Honeywell .
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Overacker

customer_reviews.title: Safety for important documents
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with this box. We have our wills, gold and silver bars, cash, etc., in it. Then we gave a key to our daughter and hid the thing in a space very unlikely to be searched. It does not attach to anything and so it would be very easy for someone to steal.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Defective lock
customer_reviews.text: This safe arrived in a box that looked new, but safe itself was dirty and dusty. Upon opening the safe, I saw that the screw and washer keeping the lock mechanism fastened had come off. I put those back on and when I used the key to turn the lock, I noticed that the locked turned in the WRONG DIRECTION and in fact did not lock the safe. If you want a safe that locks, DO NOT BUY THIS SAFE.
customer_reviews.author: M. Banerjee

customer_reviews.title: works well for small items... I got ...
customer_reviews.text: works well for small items ...I got it to keep SNOOPY Eyes off private papers and not use a bank safe deposit box for items I want to get to often. If you put jewelry in it, it's worthless because anybody could walk off with this box. AND it's fairly heavy, so works to keep stuff relatively safe (i.e., if strangers are doing work in your home etc.)
customer_reviews.author: F, Carole Miller

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I have ever purchased! The lock broke within 2 weeks. I fixed it but only temporarily. It broke again within a few days! Flimsy flimsy flimsy! !! I wouldn't recommend this product to an enemy !!!
customer_reviews.author: Purplegirl

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed  !!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Honeywell safe, and put my things in it about 2-3 weeks ago. I got rid of the box of course, and now I can’t get them out without breaking it. The keys will not open the box. I am very disappointed, I would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Lid closes loose and slides up and down & left and right.
customer_reviews.text: Lid is loose even when locked. Lock slide is loose and sloppy and doesn't hold lid on tight. This means it's not fire resistant and not secure. Poorly made. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: INVETREP

customer_reviews.title: Is 3 mouths worth 25 dollars?
customer_reviews.text: So I order it on April 11 2020 now it’s July 3rd and basically I cannot get the lock to lock with the key super kool. Since the reason I bought I was to keep medications and or money and private things away from children etc. 25 dollars for 3 mouths sounds super fair 😂. I’m trying to fix it I can’t I never once dropped it or damaged it it anyway open and close it on daily, now can’t get it to long while it worked was great don’t think 3 mouths is fair tho really.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Security Safe!
customer_reviews.text: This security box is great; was exactly as advertised and meets the needs we had perfectly. We purchased it for my mother in law and she is unable to lift heavy items so we needed something like this that would be lightweight but still provide security for her valuable documents, jewelry, etc. This box was exactly what we needed, thank you for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: asugurl44

customer_reviews.title: Won't  lock!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this box today. Totally thrilled when I saw it. It was perfect, sturdy and looks great. BUT THE LOCK DOESN'T WORK. Its such a hassle to return because of the weight. I will see if I can get new keys??
customer_reviews.author: Karenann Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller capacity than dimensions would suggest
customer_reviews.text: We could not get the desired contents into this box despite the dimensions listed on the Specs. The box has a t least 0.5" lip which means the interior is too small for an item with length and width 1" less than the box dimensions. This defeated the purpose for us. It is also heavier than expected which is a plus for sturdy and security, but a negative for transport. It came with two keys both of which worked the lock smoothly, but the (lack of) complexity of the teeth suggested that this isn't the best lock. All in all, a "meh" product.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: While I'm not going to throw it into a fire to test it, by all appearances, this is a great little box and exactly what I wanted. It is strong and very hefty for its size with plenty of room for my needs. When I say little, I don't mean tiny. It's just not quite as big as some of the others, but the advertised specs are accurate. So, there is no deception. It's perfect for my needs. A good box at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke Sr

customer_reviews.title: package was open and covered in some sort of dust.
customer_reviews.text: this product was already open. not discrete shipping and the product had some sort of powder on it. it was gross and i can feel some glass on it too because i feel it in my hands. the lock box was fine though. i cleaned it off. it came with two keys in a plastic baggy which i also found odd
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Pena

customer_reviews.title: The Safest Feeling Safe To Keep Your Stuff Safe
customer_reviews.text: Need a safe? Well if you’re looking for security and something that’s easy to move and hide, look no further!! This thing makes me literally feel safe with my possessions in it. It’s thickness and sturdiness instill confidence my contents are secure and there’s even foam padding inside to cushion anything. It using a key lock is nice as I can carry one key with me and hide another Incase. This is overall a great value for the money and I would order this again if I have a need in a second!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great for Protection
customer_reviews.text: Protects my valuables. Don't rely on it to protect you from burglars, but great against fires.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Van Aken

customer_reviews.title: A Nice little safe
customer_reviews.text: I like how this locks and stays locked, comes with 2 keys, and has a handle. I use it to hold my medicine I take after I fill up my weeks worth of meds, I put my bottles in this safe and put away til its time to refill my weekly holder the following week. (keeps prying small hands out). What I don't like is that it don't have the rope type of thing that the travel version I used to have that can attach to it to attach to a super heavy object.
customer_reviews.author: Vabanuelos

customer_reviews.title: It's a metal box.
customer_reviews.text: No, seriously. It's just a metal box with a lock on it. It's a little heavy since it's made of metal, and it comes with an egg-carton shaped foam for the bottom interior. Looks sturdy enough and with the lock on the inside, people would have to drill through the lock on the top or saw through the side to break it open. Then again, the key also seems a little generic. Don't know how hard it is to pick it or obtain a key "replacement" from Honeywell to open it, so caveat emptor, I guess. For its price, it stores stuff and prevents people from looking inside, which in my opinion, is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: DaedalusZero

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality this is the second one we bought. The other one is about 10 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value - inexpensive security
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughter to store important stuff while away at college. Works great for important documents, passport, and even a firearm. Small enough to secure under the bed or in a closet - using the cable anchor or simply hiding it from view.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Walmart 10 some years ago and it has never done me wrong. I only bought another one because my daughter got into my stuff and lost my key. Thankfully, she left it unlocked so I could easily transfer my documents. I love this so much that I am keeping my original in hopes of finding the key. It's a buy that you will never regret!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: A fairly sturdy lock box with simple security
customer_reviews.text: This simple lock box is fairly sturdy with a simple key lock. The size is good for home documents in envelopes or medication bottles laid down in it. It is a little heavy to lift when full.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough
customer_reviews.text: I would have been throughly happy had the box been slighter bigger, enough to put a full size sheet of paper in. The size on Amazon is not correct. It seems sturdy though and will be perfect to gun my gun in.
customer_reviews.author: LAbluez

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Much too heavy for me to handle. I have never used it....just sitting on floor.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these. they are very strong. attractive too. I don know how they hold up to fire as i have never put it to the test nor do i wish my house to end up in flames but for what i use it for, it gets the job done. Its a bit heavy and that is a good quality i think.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mcclean

customer_reviews.title: Good secure box, not really a safe.
customer_reviews.text: This box is great for hiding "paraphernalia" from prying eyes, especially young children. I wouldn't say this is a "safe" in anyway, because breaking this open wouldn't really take much effort. The padding in the bottom is nice, and the box does create a pretty air-tight seal. Would recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Really High-Quality lockbox I got after some things were stolen from my car. Largest inner dimensions I could find at this price range, padded and secure - not easily opened/picked
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It not a brinks safe You find at the local bank but it’s great piece of mind for keeping your seeds away from getting your medication also great for keeping important documents from getting lost . Wish it came with something so that idk lose the keys to this safe
customer_reviews.author: JabberJawJR

customer_reviews.title: Not fire resistant, dimensions are misleading
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't say anywhere on the box/packaging that it's fire resistant, so obviously there are doubts about that. Dimensions are 12.7" by 9.0", but that's external, so you won't be able to store your standard letter sized 11" by 8.5" papers without folding them. It also feel flimsy, definitely can be pried open by a screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: crackerjoe

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy, double walled steel box. I like it better than the insulated plastic Sentry fire-resistant boxes I have. Not sure if it has insulation between the steel layers, but the usable space inside vs. The outside dimensions is better than Sentry as well.
customer_reviews.author: traveler22

customer_reviews.title: one place to hold them all
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for something to fit all my important documents. It is not big enough for a birth certificate (unless you fold it) but it is deep enough to fit more than a few things smaller
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Cohen

customer_reviews.title: not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: The safe was delivered prompt, however it was exposed. Its sturdy, a bit heavier than what I thought. It has a simple lock, which seems easy to pry open without the key. Good for small envelopes, and passports. Larger documents have to be folded in half. Its not ultra amazing, but served the purpose for what I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: Arcadia Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Best safe ever worth the money it really holds alot of my important paperwork a very good deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: deborah mills

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pill lockbox!
customer_reviews.text: We got this safe to put our clients medication in. The safe is the perfect size and is easy to open and close. Fit in our desk drawer. Just one extra step of accountability and security for our organization.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Richards

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: I think this bad boy will stand up 2 just about anything for sure!!😁 I’m gonna fix my name on it with my “Identity Making Tape” machine that I also ordered off Amazon, so God forbid it gets blown away by a Twister or Found floating away in a flood.... I KNOW it’ll be returned in one piece, SECURED,and DRY!! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Marcie W

customer_reviews.title: It will keep my money safe in case of a fire.
customer_reviews.text: The safe is compact, heavier than it looks, solid and sturdy. I believe it will do the job it was advertised to. I just hope it doesn't have to. Product was delivered promptly and intact.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W

customer_reviews.title: It's a safe
customer_reviews.text: Look it's not goint to stop your valuables from being destroyed in a fire, but if you're in Earthquake Country, it will help to secure important documents or small keepsakes.
customer_reviews.author: EKS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for safety!
customer_reviews.text: With all this climate change, my husband and I wanted to protect certain items. This is a great lock box. Everything fits in it great! The key works and it's great to have certain things kept for safe keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Very well made , solid, and perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome security safe. Extremely well made, durable, and exactly what I wanted. Everything fits into it perfectly. I didn't expect to get something so well constructed for such an affordable price. I would highly recommend this product to anyone that is searching for a superior quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: A solid and well made product.
customer_reviews.text: This case is very well made, all edges are smooth and secured, easy open/close with enclosed key. I especially like that it blends in with the books in my wall of bookcases; it's almost like I can hide it in plain site! It's a great piggy bank, too, since I'm more motivated to keep adding to my stash biweekly. Should have bought this a long time ago. What are YOU waiting for?
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S

customer_reviews.title: Secure and Safe Storage
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other brands sizes, this is a good deal at $20.00. It is solid, built well, and seems to be rather tamper resistant. A case this small though can easily be stolen, predrilled holes inside woulda been a welcome subtraction, for securing to a floor. At the price, a highly recommended value.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Fire proof lock box.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this. It will work ok for the small thing I wish to Secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong, heavy, and inexpensive. Must buy.
customer_reviews.text: Typical Honeywell Safe. Very heavy duty feel to it. You can tell by the weight that it is a tough safe. Perfect for holding important items. Cash, Watches, jewelry etc... For the money it's the best.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Safe Keeping
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. They put scissors and hair clippers in it to keep secure from the children. The box arrived with a key lock. Keeps the children safe.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bice

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect and as described. Next time place box in mailing box. It was just in its regular box for the product for the world to see.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Street

customer_reviews.title: Super secure and sturdy, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I lock my pistols in this to transport to and from the gun range, it holds both guns in their holsters and has room for an extra mag or two. Thick, sturdy, strong lock, and easy to transport. I totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good lock box
customer_reviews.text: This is a commendable box. It has some weight to it and feels sturdy. My only criticism is the keys seem very simple and almost flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Dibsdone

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Having problem with the lock cannot lock properly no good I will never recommend it to Hannah body
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My mom had one so I ADULTED and bought one too!
customer_reviews.text: This box fits easily under my dresser (trying to be more discreet people). I have no issues with the lock and I like that the inside is padded.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Great value for the money. Given as a gift to new home owners who had “everything”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits the need
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased to keep medications from little hands. Its an added sense of security and works great.

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: I love this , it can keep my very important papers safe
customer_reviews.author: Nasimah  aziz

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock box
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it’s not too heavy & I think it’s a good deal. I liked it enough to buy a 2nd one & get rid of my safe deposit box
customer_reviews.author: Liz B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this safe is very good. It’s heavy and sturdy. Perfect size to fit a couple of things. Came with two keys which i liked cause I loose things easily. Overall i really like this safe, its of good quality, and I keep my important things inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Bella

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy safe but you have to make sure you put the keys away somewhere safe because they are kinda small
customer_reviews.author: JEN

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: This was very useful and strong. It holds a good amount and has a very useful amount of looks. The handle works great and the keys do too
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ke

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: This lock box is good value that should serve as light safe for items you want to keep at home

customer_reviews.title: Great Security Box
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty security box. Good storage capacity and secure lock. Recomend
customer_reviews.author: Robert McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: A lifetime gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to the grandkids so they could lock up their valuables. One gift that could last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: R.peery

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My nephew asked me to buy this for him, and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: krondo92

customer_reviews.title: Take my stuff
customer_reviews.text: I just made it easy for robbers to steal all my valuables in one easy location. And they will remain safe.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good box, could be thicker but worked well for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: small safe
customer_reviews.text: this is my second one that I bought. I love how well built it is

customer_reviews.title: Heavy little safe
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it’s fire resistant or not but it is very heavy. Happy with my purchase

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple box, seems durable, and heavy duty. Decent quality for the price.

customer_reviews.title: STURDY!
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy box for valuables.. right size and good space. Handle is great asset.....

customer_reviews.title: Whoa!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift, no burglar would want to carry this!!

customer_reviews.title: sturdiness, longevity
customer_reviews.text: nicely made, a bit heavy, but thats where the sturdiness comes into play. overall i like it
customer_reviews.author: jenise

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well made box, perfect size, the lock and key works nicely. This item was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: WalkerWoman

customer_reviews.title: Honeywell Lockbox
customer_reviews.text: I love this lockbox. It is heavy duty and is exactly what I needed. I purchased it really just to store my passport, important documents, my gun and etc. I was tempted to purchase a safe with a keypad, but this is fine. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LuvAshia Collins

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but very low security.
customer_reviews.text: Provides almost no security. The hinge is exposed so it can be removed. The lock can be picked by a novice. Has sharp metal edges. I will modify the hinge and replace the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open
customer_reviews.text: I would love this safe if it were so difficult to open. I never use it bc it doesn’t open half the time and trying to open it is very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Rodriguez

customer_reviews.text: Good lock box for the price. I like that it came with extra keys
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie.

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: this was what I was looking for , I wanted something sturdy to hold my papers, so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I use it to hold my rolled change. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R.

customer_reviews.title: I doubt it would keep someone out for long if they really wanted to get in to it but if you just want to keep stuff away from prying roommates then it's still a good
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem to add real security. I doubt it would keep someone out for long if they really wanted to get in to it but if you just want to keep stuff away from prying roommates then it's still a good buy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a strong box for my personal papers. I was not disappointed. Recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my documents
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect size , I bought for documents in case of a fire because I live in a fire zone . It small enough to put up and light weight enough to pick up and go . It’s very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and secure
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I should have read the dimensions before ordering. But this is a decent size, secure lock box with some good weight to it!

customer_reviews.text: I keep pics of my deceased son in this. Keeps them safe.

customer_reviews.text: It was sturdier than I thought which was a nice surprise for the price

customer_reviews.text: I got this for all my important papers and it’s hold envelopes size also

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice box. But the lock is a nut and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice box. But the lock is a nut and bolt type. We use this box to budget cash for the week so we are constantly opening and closing it and the lock comes unscrewed often. Easy enough to tighten it back. Just annoying. I don't know if other boxes are better or different though.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Ann Walsh

customer_reviews.title: It's a little narrow for 8. 5 X 11 ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a little narrow for 8.5 X 11 documents, but it seems very well built. Cost less than similar ones made by other companies.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. He loved it! It’s great for storing small important and personal items. I am about to order one for myself! Great quality, beautiful case.

customer_reviews.text: I have been using this safe for a few months now. It is very sturdy and has yet to let any of my things be stoles.

product_meta.title: Honeywell Safes & Door Locks - 6104 Fire Resistant Steel Security Safe Box with Key Lock, 0.17-Cubic Feet, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackKeep your cash, electronics, and other small valuables secured with the key-locking feature of the Honeywell 6104. This security box includes 2 entry keys in case of misplacement or multiple users. The 6104's lock makes it perfect for any home, small office, travel, and keeps valuables safe from unwanted access. The concealed hinge keeps your small valuables protected from thieves and other unwanted users by preventing prying of the door. This box includes a foam padded floor mat to ensure that any valuables remain in excellent condition and will not be scratched by the sturdy steel construction of the safe. This safe box is built with a sturdy double steel wall construction and is equipped with fire resistant insulation. This security box has a durable scratch resistant powder coat finish that protects the safe from scratches and keeps it looking clean in your home or office for years. The carry handle makes it easy to transport from place to place and has a 1 Year Limited . The exterior dimensions are 3. 9 in H x 12. 7 in W x 9. 0 in D. The interior dimensions are 3. 3 in H x 11. 9 in H x 7. 6 in D. LH Licensed Products, leverages premium consumer brand power to deliver innovative solutions for unmet and emerging consumer needs around the world.
